title: RAPIDS kNN - 30 seconds - [0.938]
description: Simple kNN scores LB 0.938 in 30 seconds!In this notebook, we build a simple model using Nvidia RAPIDS cuML's blazingly fast kNN algorithm. The high CV and LB of this model confirms the simple nature of Kaggle's Ion Switching competition data. We will be using this competition's cleaned dataset posted here. So this notebook also shows that the clean dataset is infact very clean. Feel free to use the clean dataset in your future notebooks and don't forget to upvote the clean dataset :-) The clean dataset uses Markus' great cleaning method here.
